title: #333 – Andrej Karpathy: Tesla AI, Self-Driving, Optimus, Aliens, and AGI
description: Andrej Karpathy is a legendary AI researcher, engineer, and educator. He’s the former director of AI at Tesla, a founding member of OpenAI, and an educator at Stanford. content:encoded:
